actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to increase access to quality health care in frontier communities by allowing health clinics and health centers greater medicare flexibility and reimbursement.
short_title: Medicare Frontier Health Clinic and Center Act of 1997

summary.text: Medicare Frontier Health Clinic and Center Act of 1997 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to permit health clinics and centers in health professional shortage areas with an average of at most six individuals per square mile to participate in the Medicare rural hospital flexibility program.

titles.title: Medicare Frontier Health Clinic and Center Act of 1997

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to increase access to quality health care in frontier communities by allowing health clinics and health centers greater medicare flexibility and reimbursement.
